Preamble (32 bit):
    01010101.01011010.11110011.00001000 : 0x555af308
    Even though it should have been 0xaaa5fc01 LIRC wants it this way

Temperature (LSB first):
    100000 : ION/FAN/VENT
    101100 : DEHUM
		100010 : 64F (17 decimal)
		010010 : 65F
		110010 : 66F
		001010 : 67F
		101010 : 68F
		011010 : 69F
		111010 : 70F
		000110 : 71F
		100110 : 72F
		010110 : 73F
		110110 : 74F
		001110 : 75F
		101110 : 76F
		011110 : 77F
		111110 : 78F
		100001 : 79F
		010001 : 81F
		110001 : 80F
		001001 : 82F
		101001 : 83F
		011001 : 84F
		111001 : 85F
		000101 : 86F

Timer:
    Timer field contains number of HOURS before turning on or off. Another field
    contains either '0000' for 0:00 or '1111' for 0:30, enabling use 30 minutes
    resolution like 01:30 or 02:00. Stock remote won't allow to enter 10:30, 11:30
    or 12:30 (they'll fit protocol but won't fit LCD screen). I'm not sure if the
    unit itself will recognize such values.
    Two bits seems to designate if timer value is present and if this is an ON
    or OFF timer value being set (I don't think you can set both at the same time;
    by "the same time" I mean "one timer resets the other", you can't set like
    "turn ON in an hour and then turn OFF in three hours").

Fan speed (LSB first):
    0100 : auto (n/a in ION/FAN/VENT mode; only possible value in DEHUM mode)
    1100 : speed 1 (speed 1, 2, 3 are valid in COOL/ION/FAN/VENT modes)
    1010 : speed 2
    1110 : speed 3
    !
    +-- manual fan speed if '1', auto if '0'

Louvers have no permanent bits in the status; my guess it works much like a key in the
regular TV remote. Here's why I think so:
This one is recorded while louvers were 'on':
100000.00100011000010.1100.00000000.000.1000000000001.10100000000.011111000.0100 : FAN3-FAN1-A
Then I pressed 'LOUVERS' key and 'FAN' until fan went to the 3rd speed; next keypress returns
fan to the first speed. So the only difference would be the louvers value, if any; but this
packet is identical to the original one:
100000.00100011000010.1100.00000000.000.1000000000001.10100000000.011111000.0100 : FAN3-FAN1-A

ION bit:
    It seems like there's 1 bit that is set to '1' only when you operate 'blue' remote
    buttons (that is, ION mode). When you operate 'green' or 'white' buttons it seems like
    always stays '0'.

LVR:
    It seems like it set to '111' to toggle louvers. Why there are three bits remains a
    mystery; possibly there are more advanced AC models around with a different louvers
    speed/direction? TODO: What is going to happen if I send different values to this field?

                      fan  -timer - LVR --constant---             ---pad?-- chk
-temp- ---- ???? ---- spd- -------- ??? ---static---- -- ????? -- --static- sum- : description
100010.11100011000100.0100.00000000.111.1000000000001.01100000000.011111000.0011 : L-FAN-AUTO-64F

000101.11100011000100.0100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00100000000.011111000.1100 : TEMP-UP-FAN-AUTO-86F
000101.11100001000100.0100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00000000000.011111000.0110 : OFF-FAN-AUTO-86F
100000.00100010001010.1100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00000000001.011111000.0000 : ION-FAN-AUTO-86F
000101.11100010000100.0100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00000000000.011111000.1010 : AC-FAN-AUTO-86F
000101.11100011000100.1100.00000000.000.1000000000001.10100000000.011111000.1100 : FAN-AUTO-ONE-86F
000101.11100011000100.1010.00000000.000.1000000000001.10100000000.011111000.1010 : FAN-ONE-TWO-86F

000101.11100000010100.0100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00000011000.011111000.0000 : CANCEL-FAN-AUTO-86F
000101.11100000010100.0100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00000011000.011111000.0000 : CANCEL-OFF
100000.00100000011010.1100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00000011001.011111000.1010 : CANCEL-ION-FAN-ONE
000101.11100001100100.0100.00000000.000.1000000000001.10000000000.011111000.1100 : MAX-COOL
100000.00100001101010.1110.00000000.000.1000000000001.10000000001.011111000.0100 : MAX-DENSITY
100000.00100011000010.1100.00000000.000.1000000000001.10100000000.011111000.0100 : AC-FAN3-64-FAN0

100000.00100011001010.1100.00000000.111.1000000000001.01100000001.011111000.1100 : ION-FAN0-LOUVERS

100010.11100010000100.0100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00000000000.011111000.1111 : AC->AC
100010.11100001000100.0100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00000000000.011111000.0011 : AC->OFF
100000.00100010001010.1100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00000000001.011111000.0000 : AC->ION
                                                                +- 0='green', 1='blue' (???)
100010.11100000010100.0100.00000011.000.1000000000001.01111011000.011111000.1001 : ON-TIMER-0.5
100010.11100000010100.0100.00000001.000.1000000000001.01111011000.011111000.1011 : OFF-TIMER-0.5

100010.11100000010100.0100.00010001.000.1000000000001.01111011000.011111000.1010 : OFF-TIMER-8.5

100010.11100000010100.0100.10010001.000.1000000000001.00000011000.011111000.1101 : OFF-TIMER-9.0
100010.11100000010100.0100.10010001.000.1000000000001.01111011000.011111000.0010 : OFF-TIMER-9.5

100010.11100000010100.0100.01010001.000.1000000000001.00000011000.011111000.0001 : OFF-TIMER-10.0
100010.11100000010100.0100.11010001.000.1000000000001.00000011000.011111000.1001 : OFF-TIMER-11.0
100010.11100000010100.0100.00110001.000.1000000000001.00000011000.011111000.0111 : OFF-TIMER-12.0
                           !!!!  !+ - 0='normal command', 1='set timer'
                           !!!!  +- - 0=off timer, 1=on timer
                           ---- - timer, number of hours
  Shutting it down:
100010.11100011000100.0100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00000000000.011111000.1011 : AC-MODE-COOL
010010.11100001000100.0100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00000000000.011111000.1111 : AC-65-OFF
010010.11100010000100.0100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00000000000.011111000.0011 : AC-OFF-65

101100.00100011001100.0100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00000000000.011111000.1011 : AC-MODE-DEHUM
101100.00100001001100.0100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00000000000.011111000.0011 : AC-DEHUM-OFF
100000.00100011000010.1100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00000000000.011111000.1110 : AC-MODE-FAN
100000.00100011000011.1100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00000000000.011111000.1111 : AC-MODE-VENT
100000.00100001000011.1100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00000000000.011111000.0111 : AC-VENT-OFF
010010.11100011000100.0100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00100000000.011111000.0101 : AC-64-65
010010.11100011000100.0100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00100000000.011111000.0101 : AC-66-65

101100.00100001001100.0100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00000000000.011111000.0011 : AC-DEHUM-OFF
             ++ - turn 'off' if '01', 'on' if '10', 'mode' if '11' or '00' (???)
                  (timer operations use '00', temperature changes use '11')
101100.00100001001100.0100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00000000000.011111000.0011 : ION-ON-OFF
100000.00100010001010.1100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00000000001.011111000.0000 : ION-OFF-ON
010010.11100001100100.0100.00000000.000.1000000000001.10000000000.011111000.0101 : AC-TO-MAX-COOL
010010.11100001000100.0100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00000000000.011111000.1111 : AC-MAX-COOL-OFF
010010.11100001100100.0100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00001000000.011111000.0101 : AC-SLEEP-ON
010010.11100011100100.0100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00001000000.011111000.1101 : AC-SLEEP-OFF

  These three are going to be used as I don't want to spend more time decoding the protocol
100110.11100010000100.0100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00000000000.011111000.1110 : AC-START-72F
100110.11100001000100.0100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00000000000.011111000.0010 : AC-STOP-72F
100110.11100011000100.0100.00000000.111.1000000000001.01100000000.011111000.0010 : AC-LOUVERS-72F
100110.11100010000100.0100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00000000000.011111000.1110 : AC-ON-AC
100000.00100010000011.1100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00000000000.011111000.1011 : AC-ON-VENT
101100.00100010001100.0100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00000000000.011111000.1111 : AC-ON-DEHUM
100000.00100010000010.1100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00000000000.011111000.1010 : AC-ON-FAN

###############################################################################
101100.00100010001100.0100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00000000000.011111000.1111 : AC-ON-DEHUM
101100.00100011001100.0100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00000000000.011111000.1011 : AC-MODE-DEHUM
101100.00100001001100.0100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00000000000.011111000.0011 : AC-DEHUM-OFF

100000.00100010000010.1100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00000000000.011111000.1010 : AC-ON-FAN
100000.00100011000010.1100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00000000000.011111000.1110 : AC-MODE-FAN

100110.11100010000100.0100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00000000000.011111000.1110 : AC-ON-AC
100010.11100011000100.0100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00000000000.011111000.1011 : AC-MODE-COOL
010010.11100001000100.0100.00000000.000.1000000000001.00000000000.011111000.1111 : AC-65-OFF
